content.detailedDescription: The witness showed up at the pa mufon ufo public awareness day in harrisburg, pa on may 17, 2008 and gave this report. 10 years ago the witness observed an odd looking metallic flat black colored saucer with a dome and no lights fly back & forth over a bunch of trees.  the object as per the witness' description look inquisitive in nature by the flight path it took.
content.summary: Flat black saucer with a dome flew back & forth over the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a group of friends going caving at "groaning cave" in the mountains about 2-3 hours west of denver. we arrived late (11-12) at night and set up camp near the cave entrance. after camp was set up, everybody went to sleep. i couldn't sleep so i decided to do some star-gazing. after 20 minutes or so, i noticed what appeared to be a very large, bright star in the south-west. this object began to move slowly north. it then darted quite quickly, straight overhead from my point of view and then stopped totally. it remained motionless for about 45 seconds. it then moved again at incredible speed back towards the south-west. in what appeared to be a 90-degree turn in mid-flight, it darted out of sight to the north.
at the time, the experience felt quite surreal. my first instinct was to wake everybody up and tell them what had happened. yet i did not. i thought everybody would think i was crazy or something. i had the distinct impression while observing this event, that the object, knew i was watching. it seemed that as soon as i saw the object moving slowly, it then darted straight above me. after the object moved out of sight, i just sat there for about an hour; thinking i should probably set an appointment with my doctor to get a cat-scan. time was kind of disjointed, and i remember waking up in a lawn chair, freezing my tail off at about five in the morning.
i have never told anybody about this until now. yet it remains the most puzzling and vivid event of my life. something happened to me recently that has brought all of this back to the forefront of my life, and so i have decided to "put it out there" so to speak. my recent event confirms for me, something huge is going on, or i really need to get that cat-scan.
content.summary: Very large star like object in sky

content.detailedDescription: The witness showed up at the pa mufon ufo public awareness day in harrisburg, pa on may 17, 2008 and gave this report.  a dark triangular craft was seen in december during the late 90's emitting a beam flying along the highway moving with the anonymous witness' car at the same relative speed.  the car was moving at the rate of 55 mph.  the craft was seen on the highway while the witness was going from halifax, pa to lykens, pa.  the triangular craft was dark with white lights across the back.  after about 1 minute of following the car, the craft turned on its lights on the underbelly (which appeared to be like search lights that beamed down to the ground) and flew away over the trees that lined the highway.
content.summary: Dark triangular craft emitting a beam flying along the highway.

content.detailedDescription:
Camping six miles east of cabo san lucas in dec. 1978 i checked my boat at 9:30 pm.  returning to my camper i saw what i first thought must be a 747 blowing up above the northern mountain peak perhaps 2 miles to the north.  i started yelling and several people joined me.  what we were witnessing was a huge glow, with a whitish, brighter glow about one third of the way in from each side.  the glow could not be described as solid though may have been.  one of the people with me said "it is two flying saucers."  this is when i realized i was witnessing something special.  it descended into the ocean, growing dimmer as it came down.  i viewed it for a period of 45 seconds to a minute and a half.  i witnessed my children being born, but this remains the most vivid thing i've ever seen.
i'm a school teacher, and the next day i spoke to at least five other teachers who witnessed the same phenomenon from cabo san lucas.  they described it as going into the water.  my view was obscured by cabo falso.  at its closest, the object was about .8 miles and its furthest about 2 miles.  my feeling at the time, though i was extremely adrenalized, was that it seemed very natural.  it made no noise, though hundreds of coyotes were howling at it in the distance.  it felt as though all you have to do is spend a lot of time outside at night.  i have since seen two other strange lights in the baja desert at night, but both were 30-40 miles away--but in places there should have been no illumination whatsoever.
content.summary: Extremely large glow--several hundred feet in diameter--drifted from  2,000 feet into the ocean
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: The witness showed up at the pa mufon ufo public awareness day in harrisburg, pa on may 17, 2008 and gave this report during the public forum q & a session.  all that was known was that a yellow orb flying in night sky & a blue light came from above & zapped it making the orb vanish.  no other craft was seen above the orb from where the blue light came from.
content.summary: Yellow orb in night sky zapped by a blue light that came from above.

content.detailedDescription: This is a report that was taken during the pa mufon ufo public awareness day on may, 17, 2008 at the harrisburg, pa north shore library.  the witness was going sky watching in the union deposit area of harrisburg, pa during the approximate month of august, 2001 for meteors and saw a pale redish/orange round orb/ball moving via no direct path in the sky.  this was seen on 2 separate incidents during the same approximate time frame.
content.summary: Pale redish/orange round orb/ball moving via no direct path.

content.detailedDescription:
Just bought a new camara,so i was in the backyard taking a few photos trying out the camara,has a nice 12x zoom,i saw a plane above so i thought i would zoom in on it and get a shot. than i noticed out of the corner of my eye a strange,object to the east(now planes travel all the time in this area so im very aware of there shapes and sound and vaper trails ect)this object made no sound and was traveling at a good rate of speed heading south east in a straight line, it was hard to find the object already zoomed(camara)just caught it in back of trees,and the camara(of course)focused on the tree if i would have got it in frame sooner it would have been better.Than object went though clouds and i lost sight of it.
now i would not have reported this but 1 month earlyer we were walking dogs at around 8pm and noticed strange lites coming from the south heading in about the same direction it was 4 or 5 lites in a row
and made no sound and in a few min. maybe 4 it just disappered.
content.summary: Taking pics,outside of birds ect. noticed strange object going across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Unfortunately, this is not my personal sighting.  my friend related it to me, but i realized it would be a good idea to log it in to mufon, so i took careful notes.

he and his family was on vacation in madison, wi, on lake koshkonong.  he and his dad were on the lake one day, around 3:00 pm (but just a guess), and were looking at the sky.  they noticed two small, shiny (he said they were shining in the sun and couldn't tell what color they were, but most likely metal/silvery) objects far above them, but at a slight angle, because they realized that the objects were slowly falling/ flying downwards.  he said they were moving slowly, slower than an airplane.  they thought maybe they were skydivers or even space junk, until the two objects (which never flew away from eachother-they were perfectly parallel) made a smooth 90 turn and flew away at a much higher speed, he said that they were faster than an airplane.  it was only about 1 minute until they lost sight of them.  

i found a similar report in the mufon database: object flying downwards slowly, then pulling away and flying much faster; it was in wisconsin; on a lake; even during summer.  the only two differences were the time of day (the other report was at night) and the lack of the other object.  my friend also said that the date may have been in 2007 rather than 2006, which would make the two reports almost identical.
content.summary: Two silvery objects flying in unison and pull a 90 degrees turn

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend both sound of mind and not on anything also we aren't or should i say weren't into ufo's much before this.  we  saw a dark red elongated non aerodynamic shaped space or air craft appearing to be high in the sky.  it flew in an intelligent pattern series of straight lines before going into a straight path that appeared to take it out of the atmosphere by diming down the glow to black it faded from being very visible with the naked eye to disappearing. looked as if it were glowing this deep dark red to orange color very similar in hue to the video over the arizona desert or st. paul that mr. mufon has shown.  this was over palm desert. the local tv news was running a show about a ufo meeting in a nearby desert town and said someone caught something on video so we waited to see if it was what we saw and it was just a story of the ufo convention we called their news desk and they were not interested in our story also called the ufo people at this convention and they never returned our call.

it was very very strange.  long rectangular with box shaped front section that hat long arms suddenly explode out from it which also had this same deep red hue.  very brightly glowing as we could see it very clearly though it appeared to be very high up in the sky.  we were not able to find and get the video cam set up before it faded to black.  it was quite outstanding and i thought i would contact you guys again because the hue was identical to the hue on your mufon 2007 video.  i felt it looked like it was way up in the cloudless desert sky and superheated from atmospheric friction and it was moving in a straight line thus cooling as it left the outter atmosphere.  but it may have not been nearly as high up in the sky as that and the fading to black may have been caused by something else.  but it did have gradations of this deep dark red to orange in such a way as to be plasma like fire if you will. as if the surface of the vehicle were plasma or super heated.  sorry for the incomplete description but that's about what i have to say. there did not appear to be any aspect of the vehicle that was not glowing this color.
content.summary: Very elongated dark red to orange glow but fire pattern to it.  same color as the st. paul ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was out side of my house and i saw a cylinder like thing coming from east going west kind of a yellow color and then i went inside for a minute and went back outside and i saw this star like object coming trod my house very slow. it then stops in one place over my house and sat there so i called my daddy to see if he could see this to and he went outside on his deck and said that he could see it waddling in the air so then i called my brother who lives next door and he came over and saw the same thing that i was seeing to, he said that he saw a light to the lift of the star like thing and it was strobing getting bright and then going back dim like they where commutating with each other . is star like object stayed over my house for about three hours then i went inside to fold some clothes then i went back out side and it was gone.
content.summary: I was out side of my house and i saw a cylinder like thing

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday afternoon on a hilltop park in northeast seattle, walking dog.
orange disk slowly banking away. sorry, only had a cell camera in the car.
wonder if it an airplane (see many in ther sky near here) but it was an odd orange color.
content.summary: Looked disc shaped, just gradually banked away, was it an airplane?

content.detailedDescription:
The following account is completely true and happened about 4 hours before i wrote this. it may be the most unbelievable thing i've  ever witnessed:

me and 2 of my friends (we are all from st. paul) drove out to cottage grove to hang out with a few friends of ours. we were playing basketball in the  driveway of their house for about an hour, and people began to leave. we were about to go inside when i noticed an object moving through the sky. it looked like a large satellite, and it was moving at a constant speed. being a pretty big ufo enthusiast myself, i pointed it out and we all started watching it. it soon started to make wobbles and turns that no satellite or aircraft could have made (it was way too high up to be a plane). i was wondering if it was my eyes playing tricks on me when it completely stopped in the middle of the sky. it hovered in one spot for about 40 seconds, and in that time it grew extremely bright. at that point we all knew it was no satellite we were looking at.

the object started moving again and flew into the distance. there were 5 of us watching it by now, and we called another person who lived down the block to come outside and see what was going on. we soon saw another object in the sky, and very faint, smaller dots appeared around it. the dots shot off in different directions, some moving extremely fast and some slower. one big dot stayed stationary. as we watched these dots (especially the big one) they began to change colors and it almost looked like they would split into 2 dots and then reassemble. one of the people i was with saw a red object leave the biggest dot and shoot towards the ground. all of us saw very faint shooting star-like objects flying by the area of the biggest dot.  a huge orange object soon flew through a small area of the sky in a very shooting star-like motion, and we all saw it. at this point there were six of us and we decided to get in the car and drive about a half mile away to a place where there was less light and more open space to watch.

we relocated to a parking lot with a field next to it, and we watched the objects that were still in the air. we saw some movement but not as much as before. we noticed that in the far corners of the sky there were flashing dots. pretty much every direction you turned you were able to see something in the sky. then, the big one. my friend went around to the other side of the building we were parked by to pee. he saw something in the sky and called all of us over. it was an object hovering in the air with extremely unusual lights. this one was much, much closer than any of the other things we had seen, and was actually only about a hundred feet from the ground from what it looked like. we ran over and watched it as it started moving one way, completely changed directions, and then completely turned around again. it flashed extremely brightly at least 3 times and then began to display very different patterns of lights. it almost could have been mistaken for a plane's lights at one point, but the lights kept changing and the object was moving very strangely. it disappeared over the treeline.

after this object we saw 3-4 plane-like objects move overhead, about 5 minutes apart from each other. they all came from the same direction, all were silent, and all of them headed in the same direction towards the first object we saw. they had blinking white and red lights on them but the amount of lights and the speed they were traveling was unusual. me and a friend saw one final object, with blinking red and white lights, fly in the same direction. we thought it could be a plane but i watched it carefully just in case. when it passed where we were standing it began to move up and down as it was flying, making weird movements that planes do not make. overall the entire experience lasted about 2-2 1/2 hours. these were definite ufos, we all saw them. it was like absolutely nothing i have ever seen before, and the same goes for the 5 credible witnesses i was with. i'm sure other people saw these also, as some of these objects were not subtle at all. again, these objects moved in ways planes cannot, in erratic, jerky       movements. however, they were definitely under some kind of intelligent control, as some seemed to interact with each other. each of the 5 people i was with will tell the exact same story if asked, and we all saw what we saw. these were not known aircraft.

this was my first actual ufo sighting, however i caught what appears to be an unidentified object in the sky in a cell phone picture a few weeks ago, which i can send in when i get it onto the computer this week.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple objects, flashing lights, erratic movements

content.detailedDescription:
The original and presumably unretouched picture shown here was handed over to a local canadian ufo investigations group in 2004 but never released to the public, as far as i now. i believe that it may make a worthy addition to the mufon database. i have no reason to doubt its authenticity, although i am not the witness in this case.

this picture was taken in the fall of 2004, north of montreal, qc, canada, in the laurentian region. the witness intended to capture the flock of birds in the center of the picture. she did not see the disc shaped object at the right, which seems understandable as the object appears to zoom by very quickly. motion blur is quite apparent.

i have attached the original photograph, as well as an enlargement and a digitally enhanced image (i produced the latter two pics) suggesting a 'classic' saucer shaped object, complete with a dome on top.
content.summary: Disc shaped object photographed in 2004

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside shooting some digital images of the full moon 11:30 in the evening, using a canon powershot 6.0 megapixel with 48x zoom. i took four successive shots of the moon and this object appeared on the last shot. we were reviewing the images and saw this red 3 dimensional image. the size of this, whatever it is must be enormous. we went back out and looked again but were unable to see it.
content.summary: Red diamond shape object appears on last image of 4 shots of a full moon

content.detailedDescription: Very cloudy night. the neighbor across the street knocked on our door and said come look at this. me, my dad, the neighbor, and two younger siblings stood on the porch and immediately saw what our neighbor was pointing at. we were on my parents' front porch looking west. the clouds were illuminated by a ball of light (i did not see an object).  it stayed in one place for 2-3 minutes then shot a short distance and stopped.  all of a sudden it disappeared, and i thought it was gone but about 30 seconds later, it appeared again just a little south of where i first saw it.  i ran in and got a 35mm camera and it was in the same place when i came back out. instantaneously, it shot across the sky, stopped, shot across the sky again, and stopped (like a zig zag).  i couldn't see it move, just appear, disappear, then reappear in another location.  i took 3-4 pictures. nothing discernable except for alluminated clouds (could see outline of clouds like a there was a light behind them). we watched the news that evening, and the reporters were saying that alot of people were calling in and it was "supposedly" a weather balloon. no way!  it hovered and shot across the sky, stopped, hovered and shot away.  not a weather balloon... unfortunately, i included the pictures in an english report which i never got back. somewhere in all of the old photos are the negatives.  i tried to get my report back (end of my 10th grade year), but the teacher no longer had it. i was real disappointed because to this day, it was my only proof. i'm not saying i saw a flying saucer, i'm saying it wasn't a weather balloon or a plane. this is not a lie or my imagination. i really could care less if anyone believes me. that was 27 years ago. i still live close to my parents' house and have never seen anything like that since.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: April 1981 - plano, texas - not a weather balloon...

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was approximately 14 years old and my sister was 9.  i come from a large family, so my 2 little sisters and i often slept in the same bed.  one night, my youngest sister and i were sleeping in the same bed.  i awoke for some reason in the middle of the night and immediately noticed a baseball-sized orb of light passing through my closed window and entering my bedroom.  it moved slowly across the room toward me and stopped, or hovered, just over the bed.  it seemed to hover over me as if it were watching me.  i was able to see that it was a 3-dimensional orb, and it looked like a ball of glass that had swirling red and orange lights - like swirling, colored liquid, that was self-illuminated.  after about 20 seconds it shot off through the room and exited the opposite window.  i looked over at my sister and was surprised to see that she was also awake.  i said, "did you see that???" and she calmly responded, "yes."  i said, "what was it?"  she said, "it was an angel."  i didn't understand what she meant, because that did not seem to correspond with what i had just seen.  i said, "how long have you been awake?"  she replied, "about 5 minutes." and i said, "and you saw it the whole time you were awake?" and she said, "yes."  i didn't know what else to say, and we both went back to sleep.  i didn't think about it or speak about it to anyone else for over 30 years.  then in the last 6 months or so the events of that night have been coming back in my mind and bothering me.  i decided to ask my sister if she remembered that night.  she said she did, so i asked her again what she remembered about it.  she was reluctant to talk about it, and tried to explain it away as just a reflection in our window.  i know that i did not see a reflection of light in the window.  what i saw was 3-dimensional.  it entered our room.  it hovered over my bed, apparantly observing us, and then shot off.  i don't know if this is considered a ufo sighting - but i know i saw what i saw.  i know i was wide awake at the time, and i know my sister saw it too, though she is reluctant to speak of it.
content.summary: Small orb of light entered my bedroom, hovered over me and my sister and then shot off.

content.detailedDescription: In my back yard to sky watch. cloudy night but an almost full moon lightened the sky between clouds. to the north i saw a bright round light. drawing a path to my house. came inside grabbed a jacket and my husband saying you've got to see this. when we got back outside it had risen in the sky but closer to our house. flying underneath the cloud cover.Just a big round light, no sound , no blinking lights. then it did a corkscrew manuver then just blinked out. it didn't go behind a cloud it just winked out. as for my reaction, my husband and i have seen alot of unusual things in the sky over the last 2 yrs. a ufo was reported in delevan a few months ago, we saw a triangle afew months ago which i reported, so i was not really surprised. but any time i see one it is an awesome experience. especially just blinking out. just like someone just turned off the light.
content.summary: Round circle of light came close then just blipped out

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in the late 1970's(about 1978 or 1979), the year the first space shuttle was dropped from a plane thousands of feet in the air, to see if it would glide to ground or drop like a brick to the ground. i remember the space shuttle because they tested it's flying capabilites in our small town called 'nasa bay' in texas; that year the space shuttle flew over our elementary school and the whole school was let out to watch it glide over.

it was the summer of that year, elementary school was closed for summer vacation, when my sister and i had our ufo encounter. we were coming back from the grocery store on an old dirt road...A short cut to our apartments. my mother was driving the station wagon and my sister and i were in the back seat. our mother would not let my sister and i sit in the front seat, so we would often fight over who would get to sit with their arms over the front seat. that day it was high noon and the sun was very bright and hot! i managed to sit with my arms over the front seat. there was a really good song on the radio that i was really enjoying, however static made it hard to hear the song...That made me angry but i didn't think it was strange at the time. i remember my sister tugging on me, but i thought she was just trying to get my seat spot...She tugged at me about 3 times, when i finally turned my head and was about to grip her out...Tell her she could not have my spot...When to the left of the car was an object...As big as the car...Following us! following us very close! my sister asked me what the letters "u.S.A" spelled...I told her "united states of america". my sister knew her a b c's but not how to read. she said that is what was written on the ufo; she also said there were other letters on it she did not understand or reconize.

the ufo was lit up like a rainbow...Very bright! however, the sun was shinning in my mother's eyes as she drove home and that is why she did not see the ufo...Like the sun was in my eyes until i turned my head. we pleaded with our mother to turn her head but she said she did not want to have a wreck. the ufo had red, green, yellow, orange lights flashing around in a circle...Some of the lights did not move...It was lite up like a christmas tree! boggles the mind to think anybody could miss it because it was so bright, but that is what happened to my mother and almost happened to me too! it had three levels to it, with the bottom level the widest and the top level the smallest. it was silver and looked to be made of some kind of metal. there were what looked like landing legs tucked underneath, but could have been anything!

the ufo followed us all the way home...About a 20 minute drive. when we got out of the car the ufo hovered over our apartments...No sound...It was perfectly still. we tried again to get our mother to look up but she would not, all she could think about was taking the groceries in before the heat melted the ice cream! my mother yelled at my sister and i to take the groceries in, so we did. we got back in time to see the ufo speed away! in the blink of an eye! gone! when it left my sister and i went behind the apartment buildings to see if we could see it...But it was gone:( 

when this happened there was nobody to report our story to and my sister and i were very young and didn't think anyone would believe us...Especially since my sister saw the letters "u.S.A." on the ufo. for the longest time i believed it was a government secret vehicle and thought the reason it followed us was because the government was using the ufo story as a cover-story for their secret vehicle and needed witnesses. before i saw the ufo i watched a series everyday on cable tv about ufo's. i figured the government had access to that information and knew my family would be ideal witnesses for their ufo cover-up story. however this past year i have been studying the facts and have found that people have been reporting ufo's for hundreds if not thousands of years...Long before man could fly! the pictures our ancestors drew hundred(s) of years ago look exactly like what my sister and i saw! when my sister and i saw the ufo people would no believe us...Just the mention of ufo's and people would laugh...Let alone you telling them you actually saw one. even though people are a lot more open today...Not everybody is! my sister still can't tell her husband in fear that he would think her crazy! i tried to bring it up once to my sister's husband and got strange looks, so i didn't say anything more about it...And that was just a few years ago!

i believe that when man puts his mind to something he can do it! the 2 things that man wants to do is conquer space and time. but if man wants to go to the other stars in the heavens/universe he will have to conquer time first. is it possible that the ufo my sister and i saw was from the future? are our descendants from the distant future following us?

in later years my sister had come to believe that the ufo had written on it "u.F.O." instead of "u.S.A." i believe the reason she believes this is because she saw the letter 'f' also and when you put them together it spells "u.S.A.F"..."united states air force" but if it was the us why would the air force use other letters that my sister didn't reconize? where they top secret symbols that only specially trained people would understand...Or were the letters or/and symbols some form of future language? in the bible, book of revelations, it says the chosen will speak a language that no one else will understand.

my sister agrees to the statement above, however she does not want her named used.

thank you for interest:)
content.summary: 1978/9 rainbow lit ufo with 3 stories/levels hovered with us about 30 min.

content.detailedDescription: Walking on sunset boulevard in the echo park area of los angeles and looked up in the sky to the northeast and saw a very bright star-like object--very unusual in the middle of a sunny day.  it changed colors from orange to blue to white to red, but was very high in the sky and hard to clearly see colors.  had an aura around it and pulsated.  object moved side to side and then would stop and repeated that action twice.  all of a sudden, after about five minutes, the object disappeared.  right after it disappeared, 2 jet planes appeared high in the sky moving rapidly upward like a missile or the space shuttle--it was still clear it was jet airplanes--wing shapes were visible.  con trails and jets disappeared.  around that time, a dark, unmarked helicopter appeared overhead, fairly low in the sky.  four others witnessed the object, as this is a busy street.
content.summary: Looked like star--high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine went with his friends on snow mobiling for the day, some time in march 2008.  they had stopped for a short break when they had seen helicopters flying all around them. my friend had taken photos of the helicopters. 

just a week ago, my friend was showing me the photos. i enlarged one of the pictures to get a closer look at the helicopter, when i noticed, at the top of the page, was a purple/blue disk shaped object.  i do not know if the digital camera had a spot on the lens or it was just a reflection. 

there were several other photos showing the same object but in different areas of the pictures. i asked my friend if he or anyone else had seen the object but no one had. that's why i was wondering if it was just a spot on the lens. i don't think it was a trick. what puzzles me is that no one had seen these objects they had only seen the hellicoptors.   

i feel a little silly writing about this but i can't help wondering, what if? the following attached pics are just a few of many.


thank you...
content.summary: Disk shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
There where reports of police in our town seeing an ufo up over a ridge
near my home. my cousin and a few friends decided to take a ride and check
it out. we pulled over near the end of the ridge and got out of the car.Suddenly a ufo slowly and so quietly came over the ridge. i remember 
saying to my cousin how they aren't white but a dark brown /dark gray color. a row of square windows circled the object and from within was a bright light that encompassed the entire inside. i saw an alien standing in the window as clear as i see this monitor i am typing on. a strange thing is that after seeing the alien, my next memory is running into the car scared beyond words. the mystery is that this happened i believe in 1971 in east haven, connecticut and my friends and i never mentioned this
experience until suddenly about 5 years ago, on the same day my cousin and i had a common thought as to why we never would talk about it. it was like when we thought of the event we couldn't hold on to the thought.
i must of checked to see if time was lost and i believe no time was lost.

this ufo flew very low and slow over homes and telephone poles. it came up from behind a small mountainous ridge and covered the length of at least three houses sitting on lots around 60' wide. 

i just had to tell someone this experience and i thank you.
content.summary: Slowly flying over homes and telephone poles-very low

content.detailedDescription:
It had three flashing lights, two red and one green, it came from the direction of heathrow and emitted a low growling noise. 


i was walking home from the pub. i noticed it because i looked up and it was there. 

when i first noticed it i thought it was just an aeroplane. it was travelling across the sky in a steady, continuous movement. 

during the sighting i thought, "ooh, that's interesting".
after the sighting i thought, "ooh, that was interesting". i felt a sudden shiver. 

i lost sight of the object when i went inside my flat. i couldn't see it from in there.
content.summary: Overhead lights flashing through the clouds

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were on our way to austin traveling south on i-35.   the reason we were on our way to austin was to pick up her boyfriend at the hospital emergency room.  about 1 hour south of temple, there was a triangular shaped outline/ object that flew quickly, silently and low over the car in which we riding, in the sky just over an overpass, over the freeway.  it changed into a chevron shape and hovered over a storefront.  it firghtened us and we were confused at what we were seeing.  i asked my daughter to keep driving south as we were afraid to stop on the side of he freeway.  the perfect circle, sphere shape in the middle of the octogan was solid white and blinking in time with my heartbeat as it hovered. the orange dougle lines looked liked neon lights.  the interior was transparent and you could see the night sky through it.  the only other oodd thing i notcied was that there were very large construction lights on the right side of the freeway where this sighting occured. i told my daughter get the hell out of here.  i took notes of the time and place the night of the event and i made a sketch of what we saw that evening as well.
content.summary: Double neon orange outline in chevron shape with blinking sphere in center

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were parked at lake sherando, just talking, before he was to take me home. i stepped out of the car to smoke a cigarette and heard strange sounds coming from all directions around the lake. it was a eery metallic sound, almost musical. i could hear it on one bank of the lake and then it was if there was a "response" from the other side of the lake. the sounds were different tones but all about the same loudness. 

i screamed for my boyfriend to get out of the car and listen to this! he did and was immediaely terrified. in addition to the strange sounds, there were no other usual "night noises." in this part of the country we often here insects and other animals at night. this night it was completely silent. 
 we began to get scared and jumped back in the car to get out of there fast.  as we were driving down the road from the lake a huge disc-shaped object cleared the treetops and hovered above the car for a few moments. i swear to it. ���t this point, my boyfriend and i am terrified and i am crying and screaming. the disc took off at a speed i have never imagined and i have never been back to lake sherando again.

i came home and immediately called my friends and family and didn't get any support. 

i am a 35 year old professional woman with 3 kids. i have never seen anything of this magnitude before in my life and have been unable to think about anything else since then.
content.summary: Strange noises and sightings at the lake

content.detailedDescription:
At about 12:20 pm, 19 may 2008, i observed what appeared to be a large, metallic disk hovering very near the surry nuclear power station. (this is a little more than hour from the time of this writing, so the memory is still fresh and vivid).

i was on my bicycle riding east on the colonial parkway when i spotted an object over the james river, moving from east to west at a very slow speed. at first i thought it may have been a kite because it was a very windy day (the winds were gusting out of the sw at 20-30mph) and people do come out and fly their kites from the beaches when the winds are good. but when i came to an open spot in the road unobstructed by trees i stopped to get a better look and decided it was much too large to be a kite. it is a about a mile across the channel to the surry station and what i saw appeared to be just over the beach, but near the station���s twin domes.  using them as a reference point it must have been at least as large as they are, and perhaps larger. the object was moving very slowly against the wind, left to right from my vantage point, when its upper surface caught the sunlight it reflected like a sheet of aluminum foil. its underside was dark. i thought that it might be an advertising balloon or dirigible, but the shape did not seem right. this was definitely a flattened disk. and, because it was so windy it did not seem like a day to take a blimp up. (and, with security so high these days it does not seem logical that anyone would be permitted to fly that close to a nuclear power station. i have seen military helicopters on training missions over the river, but even they keep their distance from the power plant.)

i have eliminated helicopters and small aircraft because, as i say, this object was hovering/drifting and appeared to be making a very leisurely circuit of the power plant. i walked down to water���s edge to see if i could get a better look, but without binoculars i couldn���t make out any other useful details. i watched it for a good 15-20 minutes. in that time it had moved around the station, going against the wind the whole time.

unable to see anything ales, i decided to hurry home, grab my binoculars and camera to see if i might get a better look. it took me about ten minutes to get home and another fifteen to get back on the parkway by car. but, by the time i returned the object had gone. i drove a few miles down the parkway hoping that it might have drifted elsewhere, but the sky was empty except for a few clouds. now, i wish i had stayed until it left. it would have been interesting to see which way it went.
content.summary: Disc hovered near surry power station

content.summary: Object photographed from my yard

content.detailedDescription:
My abduction story,
  it was 1985 in los angeles. i lived downtown los angeles at the wayward hotel on 6th street. i can't remember the room # but i laid down maybe 6 hours before this happened. i woke up somewhere around 7:30am i was laying on my back and the sun was bright to my eyes. i wanted to sit up on the bed first before opening my eyes. i could here the traffic outside. i tried to sit up but could only get about half way up. so i tried again to sit up and just couldn't get up. next i thought if i would move my legs over the side of the bed onto the floor i might be able to sit up that way. i couldn't move from that point. i knew i wasn't alone in the room, i felt i wasn't alone so i tried to open my eyes to make sure but i couldn't open my eyes. the middle of my eye lids i could move but the bottom part wouldn't budge. then i felt a hand on my right shoulder, then i started lifting up off of the bed.From a horizontal position to an upright position. i kept trying to open my eyes and i'm saying let me see, let me see...But i couldn't open my eyes. on the way upright i was kicking sideways and i knocked my coffee cup off the nite stand beside the bed and chipped the side of the nite stand. i heard the cup shatter when it hit the lenolium floor. i touched the back board of my bed with my feet. i wasn't getting anywhere trying to open my eyes. i decided to stop kicking and go inward and meditate on jesus to come to me and about 30 seconds later i'm horizontal again and my weight comes back to me as i'm back on the bed again. at that point i felt pretty good about that. i thought lets try this one again i tried to sit up this time and was able to sit up and i opened my eyes and there was no one in the room with me as i could see and the door was locked from the inside. 
   i don't remember feeling any pain while i was weightless, but when i checked the mirror i could see an indentation on my right temple area of my head. it looked like there was something under the skin, or they had taken something out of that area. the indentation in my right temple area was like a circle but it wasn't even. it was jagged. over the years it changed shape a little from being more round to oblong. now it's barely noticable. but it was quite noticable then and up till about 2001. then it was starting to fill back in. i can still see the area but now i have to pencil it in to see it good. on july 2nd 2001 i moved to indiana from los angeles i've been working at armour eckridge here in peru. while at work at finishning time i went out to start my car and go to turn in my paper work. across the street there is an open field and i saw a couple of lights to start with but then the light moved over so i watched it for a while. when the light got over so far it started to move upward and when it got so far up a bunch of lights lit up and i could see that it was metallic in nature and solid black. then the lights went out and i didn't see it any more. 

paul hamblin.
content.summary: It was a triangle metalic, black, w/lites on the side.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't remember every details, because it happend a very long time ago in the 70's. i was about 8 or 9 years old at that event and i couldn't remember this until the memories suddenly popped into my head when i was about 16.

it was about noon (12 o'clock) after school on saturday (in the 70's we had school on saturday too). i remember exactly that it was saturday, because only on saturdays we had school only in the morning.

there were dozens of children and parents on the street (in the 10th district of budapest, called "k���b���nya" in the building estate "���jhegyi lak���telep").

i was playing around on the ground with some stones, drawing something on the  sidewalk, when i heard a really loud, continous rumbling from the sky.

i looked up but at first i couldn't see anything, just the multi-story buildings (with 10 floors). then a huge flying object appeared above and from behind the building which was in front of me. i think, the object was flying maybe 10-20 meters above the house (so about 30-50 meters above the ground... remember, i was very young, so i only knew, it almost touched the roof of the building) and it covered the sky almost completely. it flew very slow and it was very loud. everybody looked up and the street was like paralized. nobody moved, just looked at the flying object. i think it lasted about 10 minutes to disappear behind the other houses.

as i said, i couldn't remember this until i grew up, but i can remember that i always dreamed about similar scenes since i was very young... almost every night for years. when i grew up, suddenly i remembered the whole event, except the shape and color of the object. when i told the whole story to a friend (who was my class mate since 2nd class), telling them that i remember this since a short time again, he replied: "i can remember this. i was there. it was green and had a shape of a triangle."

so if, somebody reads this and can remember the event, because he/she was there, please contact me at a.Beke@chello.At
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Other
content.summary: Huge ufo flying above our heads very slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was out side in my back yard watching the stars. i was looking at one star and all of a sudden right below it a big round white flash turned towards me then became smaller moved to the left slightly and dissapeared. a second later i noticed a big plane to thewest of the flash i saw. it was much lower than the light i saw. it was almost like the light noticed the plane and turned the flash towards the plane then dissapeared very fast. the big round light i saw was in the south east of the sky and east of the air plane. i felt stunned and surprised. i never saw anything like that happen before. i watch the night sky when i can. it's very amazing to me and wondurous. the light i saw was very big and round and very bright. i just stood there afterwards to see if anything slse would happen. then i went inside and told my husband and he came out but saw nothing. it was already gone.
content.summary: Saw a big bright round light flash towards me for about 2 or3 seconds then turned and moved to theleft and dissapeared.
